TopicTitle: Fairing Part Manager Deploy Type Setting Does Not Save

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.1.0.0.20893 | Windows 11 | i7-12700 | RTX 2080

The Deploy Type setting in the part manager for the AE-FF125 Fairing does not save.

If I make the change, save, open a new workspace then open the previous workspace, the Deploy Type setting reverts to ClamshellX2.
